```{r}
train<-read.csv("billets.csv", encoding = "UTF-8")

# Estimate preprocessing parameters
preproc.param <- train %>% 
  preProcess(method = c("center", "scale"))
# Transform the data using the estimated parameters
train.transformed <- preproc.param %>% predict(train)

# Fit the lda model
model_lda <- lda(is_genuine~., data = train.transformed)

# Fit the glm model
model <- glm(is_genuine~ length + margin_low + margin_up,
             family="binomial",data= train.transformed)
```

```{r}
save(model, model_lda, preproc.param, file = "models")
```
